summary:
Gives the player a hearthstone which they can leave anywhere and a power that lets them travel to it instantly. Designed to be left in the player home of your choice.
Made by request from Yickfou
descriptionHtml:
Latest notes click the version number above ^^

--
[size=5]Purpose:[/size]
Gives you a hearthstone item which you can leave anywhere and a power that lets you travel to it instantly. Designed to be left in the player home of your choice!

This is for those of us that prefer to not use fast travel, but at the end of a long adventure, just want to be home in our own bed...

Made by request from [url=/user/3233951-yickfou/]Yickfou[/url]

[img]/imageshare/images/000000-0000000000.jpg[/img]

--
[size=5]Install:[/size]
Use NMM or [url=/downloads/file.php?id=1840]Wrye Bash[/url] or extract to your Skyrim/Data folder. 

--
[size=5]Usage:[/size]
2 Powers are given to the player:
Hearthstone: this teleports the player to their hearthstone
Hearthstone Summon: this teleports the hearthstone to the player
Once you have the hearthstone object (misc) you can drop it in the location of your choice, if you manipulate it to to where you want it, it will stay where it is put.

--
[size=5]Texture:[/size]
Created from the bread texture file with clone-brushed elements from an up-scaled pressure plate.

--
[size=5]Credit:[/size]
Made by request from [url=/user/3233951-yickfou/]Yickfou[/url]
author: ScarabMonkey

files.name: ScarabMonkeyHearthstone_1-0
files.changelogHtml:
Gives hearthstone item with ebony ore model.
Gives daily power for transportation back to stone.
Does absolutely no sanity checking, best to not use during a quest event.

files.name: ScarabMonkeyHearthstone_1-2
files.changelogHtml: Changed model to homebaked bread, textured with pressure.

files.name: ScarabMonkeyHearthstone_1-5
files.changelogHtml:
Added teleport animations and sounds
Modified texture slightly (less shiny)
Now checks for Interior/Combat

files.name: ScarabMonkeyHearthstone_2-0
files.changelogHtml:
Hearthstone Summon spell added
No longer start with the object
